name: BufDelayN
description: Buffer-based delay line with no interpolation. Uses a shared buffer for delay storage.

inputs.name: buf
inputs.description: Buffer number to use for delay line

name: BufDelayL
description: Buffer-based delay line with linear interpolation. Uses a shared buffer.

inputs.name: buf
inputs.description: Buffer number to use for delay line

name: BufDelayC
description: Buffer-based delay line with cubic interpolation. Uses a shared buffer for highest quality.

inputs.name: buf
inputs.description: Buffer number to use for delay line

name: BufCombN
description: Buffer-based comb delay with no interpolation. Uses shared buffer for comb filtering.

inputs.name: buf
inputs.description: Buffer number to use for delay line

inputs.name: decaytime
inputs.description: Time for echoes to decay by 60dB
